main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported around Loring AFB in Maine on 22-23 October 1959, involving ground radar, civilian eyewitnesses, Air Police, CGI Site reports, and jet scrambles.
interesting points: A civilian reported a low-flying object with small red lights emitting intermittent red light, still visible at 23/2352.
Air Police at Loring AFB observed a fast-moving object with red and green lights, confirmed by ground radar.
Carsewell CGI Site and Burlington AFB reported objects on radar at high altitudes, with no visible objects seen by F-102 aircraft
A flying saucer was spotted by Sgt. Warren over the Caribou ANG radar site.
Jets were scrambled in response to sightings, but only stars were observed, and radar determined the altitude of the object to be less than 15,000ft.
sighted object: multiple unidentified flying objects with various shapes, lights, and altitudes
witnesses: civilian, Air Police, ground radar operators, Sgt. Warren
